trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for accessing the types, directives, and controls in the current Web project document.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para aceder a tipos, diretivas e controlos no documento de projeto Web atual.

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe tem de ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The WebFormsReferenceManager base class is implemented by designer hosts to provide access to types, directives, and user controls defined in a Web project document.
trans-unit.target: A classe base WebFormsReferenceManager é implementada por anfitriões estruturador para fornecer acesso aos tipos, diretivas e controlos de utilizador definidos um documento de projeto Web.

trans-unit.source: A control designer class can use the WebFormsReferenceManager to access the definitions in the current document, and to add a new tag prefix to the current document.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe de estruturador do controlo pode utilizar o WebFormsReferenceManager para aceder as definições no documento atual e para adicionar um novo prefixo de tag ao documento actual.

trans-unit.source: You access the WebFormsReferenceManager services supplied by the designer host through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder aos serviços WebFormsReferenceManager fornecidos pelo anfitrião através do estruturador de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>implementação.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementation can be accessed in two ways: - Classes deriving from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> property to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementation supplied by the designer host.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>implementação pode ser acedida de duas formas: - Classes derivadas de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A>propriedade para aceder a um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>implementação fornecida pelo anfitrião estruturador.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The WebFormsReferenceManager implementation is supplied through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de WebFormsReferenceManager é fornecida através de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Other designer classes can access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementation by first obtaining the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> services implementation through the designer component's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>, and then calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.GetDesigner%2A> method using the designer host <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.RootComponent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Outras classes do estruturador podem aceder a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>implementação por obter primeiro o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>dos serviços de implementação através do estruturador componente <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>e, em seguida, ao chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.GetDesigner%2A>método a utilizar o estruturador anfitrião <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.RootComponent%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.RootComponent%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.GetDesigner%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > WebFormsReferenceManager replaces the obsolete interface <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > WebFormsReferenceManager substitui a interface obsoleta <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager>

trans-unit.source: Older designer hosts may only support the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager> interface implementation.
trans-unit.target: Anfitriões estruturador mais antigos só podem suportar a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager>implementação da interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager>

trans-unit.source: Check that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> and WebFormsReferenceManager implementations supplied by the designer host are not `null` to ensure the designer host implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> and WebFormsReferenceManager classes.
trans-unit.target: Verifique se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>e implementações de WebFormsReferenceManager fornecidas pelo anfitrião estruturador não são `null` garantir que o anfitrião estruturador implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>e WebFormsReferenceManager classes.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> class is abstract, you cannot create an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> directly using the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>classe é abstracto, não é possível criar uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>diretamente com o construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>

trans-unit.source: When deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> class, override the constructor to implement custom initialization actions for your reference manager implementation.
trans-unit.target: Quando efetuar a derivação do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>classe, substitua o construtor para implementar as ações de inicialização personalizada para a implementação do Gestor de referência.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager>

trans-unit.source: Gets the register directives for the current project document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as diretivas de registo para o documento de projeto atual.

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings representing the register directives defined in the current document.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de cadeias que representa as diretivas de registo definidas no documento atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the tag prefix for the specified object type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o prefixo de sinalizador para o tipo de objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The type of the object.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The tag prefix for the specified object type, if found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A tag de prefixo para o tipo de objeto especificado, se encontrado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object type with the specified tag prefix and tag name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de objeto com o prefixo especificado e o nome da etiqueta.

trans-unit.source: The tag prefix of the type to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O prefixo de tag do tipo a obter.

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the type to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O nome de etiqueta do tipo a obter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object with the specified tag prefix and name, if found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do objeto com o prefixo de tag especificado e o nome, se encontrado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets the relative URL path for the user control with the specified tag prefix and tag name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o caminho relativo de URL para o controlo de utilizador com o prefixo especificado e o nome da etiqueta.

trans-unit.source: GetUserControlPath uses the tag prefix and name to locate the user control register directive in the current document, and returns the `src` attribute value defined in the register directive.
trans-unit.target: GetUserControlPath utiliza o prefixo de tag e o nome para localizar a diretiva de registo de controlo de utilizador no documento atual e devolve o `src` valor definido na diretiva o registo de atributo.

trans-unit.source: The tag prefix of the user control to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O prefixo de tag do controlo de utilizador a obter.

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the user control to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O nome de tag do controlo de utilizador a obter.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the relative URL path for the specified user control, if found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Foi encontrada uma cadeia que representa o caminho relativo de URL para o controlo de utilizador especificado, se; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a tag prefix for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um prefixo de sinalizador para o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the tag prefix already exists, then a new register directive is not added.
trans-unit.target: Se o prefixo de etiqueta já existe, uma nova diretiva de registo não é adicionada.

trans-unit.source: The type to add a tag prefix for in the current document.
trans-unit.target: O tipo para adicionar um prefixo de tag para no documento atual.

trans-unit.source: The tag prefix string.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de prefixo de tag.
